instruction: The given code is a modified ShoutBox library that enables further modifications for the ShoutBox. To generate an HTML file, run the code without any arguments. To enter a new line from the command line, run "psogen.py input Anonymous default 'Text'". The code contains functions to generate and write HTML data to a static HTML file, read data from a file, save new ShoutBox content, and prepare a line of content. To test or generate a static HTML file, run the code with the "__name__" variable set to "__main__".
